title: Power Outages Leave Kyiv, Ukraine, Draped in Darkness
description: The streets of Ukraineâ€™s capital, illuminated with nightlife only weeks ago, are shrouded in darkness and shadows now because of restrictions on the use of electricity. The lack of light creates moments of apprehension, but also of beauty.
dc:creator: Marc Santora and Brendan Hoffman
media:credit: Brendan Hoffman for The New York Times
